BWRPG began in 1994 and is still running... its evolved yes but its 
still the same people

> OOC: Okay, because there was another BWRPG run by Macavity, and my 
most mortal enemy of all time is in that one. I think it has since 
closed down though, officially making my RPG the longest lasting. I 
WIN! Hahahaha! Ahem, heh...
